website_summaries.verdict: Great looking tote diaper bag with a stylish design and a large number of organizational pockets.
pros: Tote style diaper bag that also has a shoulder strap option
Includes 11 different pockets that you can use to help with organizing your gear
Has an insulated pocket to keep beverages cold
Includes a special pocket for moist baby wipes
Sturdy build quality and a long-lasting product
cons: You may notice a plastic odor when the bag is new
Bag will feel bulky when full

customer_reviews.title: so I spend a great deal of time going to the hospital for regular ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 55 years young and have recently had a heart transplant, so I spend a great deal of time going to the hospital for regular tests. I purchased this diaper bag as my hospital go bag. The bag is deep enough for a couple of outfits and has all of the smaller compartments for toiletries, Kindle, snacks, or whatever one needs to take. Being a diaper bag it has an insulated bottle holder for my water bottle, and a side compartment for wipes, which I use for sanitary wipes. It's narrow enough not to be bulky and has both a handle and shoulder strap and, of course is stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Macdonnell

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: The many pockets are good for organizing but the bag itself is too heavy and bulky. Also I felt the inside was too tight and small to fit my things. I ended up returning it and kept a different one that I like. And interior color was too dark not bright enough to see.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Best diaper bag out of 3 I have used!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bag! It is smaller than my other bag (that’s a backpack) but fits MORE because of how many we’ll thought out pockets there are. Love having the wipes available from the outside, it can fit my wallet, phone, water bottle, thermos, formula, multiple diapers, multiple outfits - everything I need in the smallest bag possible. My only complaint is that it has a funky plastic smell to it, but after a week the smell is fading and almost gone. Highly recommend. A good price too! Hoping it holds up well over time!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE, NOT anymore
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I’ve only actually been able to use this for one month as my son is only a month old and the zippers are breaking off of the bag!!!!! Super frustrating especially having it break in public and the bag wasn’t even over packed and I haven’t used that zipper that much and the one time I do, it breaks!! Super disappointed. I’m really glad my husband and I searched on amazon for this diaper bag instead of settling for one in store. This has so much space, is comfortable on the shoulder, and so much more! I love that you can even clip them to the stroller if needed! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jamee R.

customer_reviews.title: She liked the easy access for the wet wipes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Daughter to use for her baby. She looked at several bags and decided that this bag was the one she wanted. She liked the easy access for the wet wipes. She said she loved all the pockets. This is her 5th child and she has had another brand for her previous children, but decided to give this bag a try. She loves it and can not wait to use it in November.
customer_reviews.author: Berri

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This is a great diaper bag, but probably only worth using as a back up. It did last us a few months, but one of the front pockets ripped. I’m not handy enough to fix it but I loved the design and colors and that it comes with the changing pad. It is nice and deep but not very wide inside. All the pockets were great and the handle along with the shoulder strap was very useful. It also has the clips to strap onto the stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE my zohzo bag
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my zohzo bag! Definitely love the stroller straps, we go out often, so they have really come in handy. The different pockets have made it so easy to stay organized, we keep small toys in one front pocket, and hand sanitizer/boogie wipes in the other. My 15 month old son no longer takes a bottle, but the bottle holder on the side fits his juice cups just as well. I love that this has the messanger bag strap with a shoulder pad, it is the most comfortable tote diaper bag I have ever had. Excellent product, highly recommend this for anyone with babies and toddlers!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Renee

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This diaper bag is awesome. Its cute and modern. Ots not fancy like some diaper bags that rich moms carry but its so cute and has the best design. I actually bought a matching blanket and matching pacifier clips. Its definetely the best for me. It comes with a changing pad which a lot dont and enough space for anything your little heart desires. It can be a purse along side a diaper bag so you moms dont have to carry both.
customer_reviews.author: Kendal Laurin

customer_reviews.title: love the pockets except the one that ripped within a week
customer_reviews.text: the one the bottle goes in has a lining that is supposed to keep the bottle warm, it doesn't. And it also was ripped completely and had slid to the bottom of the pocked after the first week. But I still love the bag and all the other pockets. Keeps me more organized and I LOVE the wipes pocket!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter who is pregnant with our grandbaby. She loves it and I received it in a timely fashion with no problems. It is exactly as described and seems a bit bigger than I expected with a really nice cleanable service. Thank you for offering a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous and Functional
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased from a Baby Registry as a shower gift. The parents selecting it chose well and I am guessing they will be delighted with the item if they haven't already seen one somewhere. It is exactly as described. Well made, lots of storage, multiple options for carrying or attaching to stroller. Fabric design is contemporary and gender neutral. Looks like a winner to me.
customer_reviews.author: Curley Girl

customer_reviews.title: Alright.
customer_reviews.text: I like all the pockets and versatility. Unfortunately, the bottle pocket fabric ripped VERY easily (why put reflective material on if it rips so easily?). Also, I didn't realize one of the clips that keep the strap attached was made inferior. It broke a month after buying. It's one of the most useful conveniences, so pretty bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie M.

customer_reviews.title: High quality, reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my granddaughter, however I gave it to her for Christmas. She is due in May. I thought the quality was a good as any $80 diaper bag. The changing pad, easy to wipe clean, I loved the feature of the side pocket to put the wipes in. I also love the grey with arrows. Dad won’t feel awkward carrying this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after a week. Easy replacement.
customer_reviews.text: The main bottle pocket ripped after a week of use. Didn't even rip at the seam. The actual material ripped. They are sending me a replacement though. But if it's the same quality and not just a fluke, I don't know if it will be worth it. There are tons of useful pockets though and it's easy to clean material. 🤷 UPDATE: NEW ONE RIPPED AS WELL. DO NOT RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Arianna

customer_reviews.title: Great product at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is affordable and adorable! It has fantastic storage space. The design is super cute. I love how it is an over the shoulder/Messenger bag. It is perfect for any sex! Mother and father can use this bag with no embarrassment 😉 The seller contacted me to make sure I enjoyed the product. That is great customer service. I would recommend this item 100%
customer_reviews.author: Verified purchase

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag. I feel organized with all the pockets. The stroller clips are very handy as we have older children in sports, it’s nice not to have to dig the bag out from under the stroller. I also like how you have access to wipes on the side pocket!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Reichelderfer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: If you want a diaper bag with everything--get this....you can read all the features, but I can tell you that they are all wonderful. We have a double stroller and use it for outings with a 1 and 3 year old. I'd buy this again if we wear it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love this - all the different compartments so well designed and thought out. Really like the changing pad. Bought this for a baby shower for our Crisis Pregnancy Center. Some lucky mom will be really happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: HERTMAN CASABLANCA

customer_reviews.title: This bag is AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT!! There isn't anything I would change about it. The changing pad is a great size and the side pocket for wipes is super convenient incase you need a wipe on the fly. I would definitely recommend this bag to every mom and would definitely gift it. It's easy to clean and the stroller straps are AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: returned
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag only to find out my husband preferred a backpack style instead. I would have kept this anyway but I didn't love it. I didn't really like the feel of the material, somewhat rough to the touch. It was kind of heavy on its own too so not sure how it would be full of stuff. Currently looking for a backpack diaper bag that we can both agree on. sheesh!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth clark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent diaper bag. Could be used for boy or girl.
customer_reviews.text: I love the diaper bag. It does not scream diaper bag. That is why I love it so much. Could be used later for other things when the baby grows up. Very practical. Material is excellent. I would recommend this diaper bag . You will love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marie K. Vannoy

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Great diaper bag! It’s big enough to carry all the necessities but not bulky. The only thing I wish is that the handles were longer.. I only use the crossbody strap
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Great bag at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my first born looking forward in using it once the baby is born. The price is also much more cheaper then any other baby bags I have tried to find in stores. Define love would recommend to all moms
customer_reviews.author: Gina Picinic

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and durable bag, taller than it looks
customer_reviews.text: Love the material and design on this bag. I do think it is awkwardly tall, so all the inside stuff is more piled than my previous bag. I would prefer a bit shorter and wider bag for ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Parker

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing diaper bag! I’m a first time mom and I really wanted a diaper bag that specifically wasn’t like a backpack. I needed a versatile bag that I could easily clip to a stroller or wear around my shoulder. And I LOVE the insulated pocket and the wipes pocket that makes changing a diaper on the go SO MUCH EASIER! I will recommend this bag to all my future moms
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love This bag for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My parents bought me this bag since I swear it was the only one on the market that wasn't a backpack! I love this bag so much It has so much pockets on the inside and outside and a lot of room. My favorite feature is the attached stroller straps, So you never lose them or have to find or forget them lol. The plus is that it's super cute and I don't have to worry about it getting dirty cause it's a wipeable material. Love love love this bag
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Very practical AND cute!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and just what I expected. Big enough for everything I need when going out - including baby stuff and my stuff so I dont need two bags. All the pockets are perfect! So my bag stays organized and each thing has its own place so I can pull out what I need right away... pacifier/diaper/cloth ect Great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: NewMom

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the pirce
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised by the quality of the bag! It’s fabulous for the price. It was bought as a gift for a friend and she loved it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Super durable, lots of pockets!
customer_reviews.text: I love this diaper bag! Has all the right amount of pockets and zippered pockets we need! We have used this every day for a year and it has held up perfectly. I even washed in washer and it's still in perfect condition. Super easy to clean. Comfortable to wear and easy to adjust the strap.
customer_reviews.author: Jesusaveddave

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is the perfect size and has a lot of different compartments to organize your baby essential needs. My husband likes it as well since he is able to carry it across his shoulder. I also like how the wipes can be placed on the outside for easy access.
customer_reviews.author: Kay32

customer_reviews.title: This bag was a very good purchase. I saw the ad during Amazon Prime ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag was a very good purchase. I saw the ad during Amazon Prime Day and even though i didn't win it (big shocker) i still had to pick it up. It is a very attractive bag and thier is a lot of storage that will come in handy. I also like how it comes with a changing pad that fits and matches with the bag. Overall i guess you coud say i am a very happy customer and I cannot wait to use it when my first born comes!
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Small but roomy bag
customer_reviews.text: This was one of our first purchases when we were found out we were expecting. It was a little smaller than we thought but it's pretty roomy and has lots of pockets that have really helped with keeping things organized. There is a plastic-y smell to it in the beginning which faded after a while. Would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: chris costello

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag, tough material.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely nice material (needs to be worked and used a lot to make it easier to use) and very roomy. Has lots of pockets. Would be 5 stars but the wipe pocket I very tight and makes it hard to get the packet of wipes in it. Also the handles drive me nuts but other than that I love the bag!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Diaper Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Exactly what I was looking for and the material it’s made out of is fantastic! I can tell this will last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Russell

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is the perfect size for a day bag, it’s got two zipper pockets which is a huge plus! I do wish that the cross over strap was a bit longer as it lands right on my waist.
customer_reviews.author: Kalee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Had a defective strap. One E-mail and they sent us a new one. Awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Enigma

customer_reviews.title: Lots of pockets
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew and his girlfriend for use with the upcoming birth of their baby. It seems like it has everything they'll need in a diaper bag with lots of pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Larger than you think, which is a plus for me!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this bag is large and can fit anything I want to bring but still has a strap long enough to wear it as a sling, keeping my hands free. It's durable material and wipes clean. And I love the print.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this diaper bag! The two features that made this one a winner was the easy access wipes and insulated bottle pocket, however the first time I used it the bottle was cold when I got there, about 30 minutes later.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag. Love everything about it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bag. The size is perfect, so many compartments and options to organize. Very well built product. Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not the best
customer_reviews.text: Bought in a July. Had baby in September and used since then (1 solid month) the side pocket with the insulation has come undone and now almost two pockets. Can’t return because I missed that window by 4 days! Ugh
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Shaver

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: Works ok for a diaper bag. It might be me, but I cannot carry it for long distance. It hurts my shoulder and I should have gotten a backpack instead.
customer_reviews.author: mareike

customer_reviews.title: Pockets galore & a changing pad too!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, functional looking bag, all kinds of pockets for organizing. Love that a changing pad comes with it! Purchased as a gift and after babysitting for my 18 month old granddaughter I know this will be perfect for the new mom! Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Janis Doyal

customer_reviews.title: Well made and very attractive.
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift, so we'll have to wait to see how they like it. But I searched reviews high and low and this bag impressed me the most. When it arrived I was pleased to give as a gift. Not too feminine for a man to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love it so far!! Has so many pockets and I love the fact with how it has a stroller strap a shoulder strap and also handles so you don't have to have it over your shoulder for like your husband.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: Best diaper bag ever! Way easy to keep everything organized and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Karlee Klein

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this bag a couple times now, twice at Disneyland! You can pack so much stuff in this bag without feeling like your lugging around a duffle bag. The stroller handles are convenient if your stroller can carry the weight of the bag. And the pockets are great for keeping small items organized!
customer_reviews.author: nicole ramirez

customer_reviews.title: pretty and big
customer_reviews.text: i don't care that it is a diaper bag. i use it for everyday and it keeps going.
customer_reviews.author: Cassiopeia Nieves

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Convenientdiaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Just got here today and I love it. It’s big and I am sure it will. Carry everything I need to take on the go. I already put some things inside but I’m sure it will fit everything it’s cute.
customer_reviews.author: Ivonne

customer_reviews.title: Looks good with lots of room
customer_reviews.text: Looks good with lots of room. But have to return it because of the "plastic like" smell, which was still there after hanging this bag outside for a week...
customer_reviews.author: P. L

customer_reviews.title: Ok diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Love the stroller clips. Material is very stiff, can’t get a new packet of wipes in side compartment. Its a little smaller than what i would have wanted. In need of a wash now but I’m not sure how it will hold up in the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Not impress.
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it looks but very tight in the inside. I could only fit one outfit. I guess the outside pockets compress it all together if they are holding stuff inside
customer_reviews.author: maria miceli

customer_reviews.title: Durable and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: I just got my Zohzo tote bag and I love it! It's sturdy enough to hold the wipes in the wipes pocket without collapsing the whole bag. And it has pockets upon pockets! It's stylish enough and spacious enough to be my diaper bag and purse in one! I won't mind carrying this around for a few years at all.
customer_reviews.author: Laueisen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best diaper bags I have owned and for the price you cant beat it. So many pockets that are the perfect size, it stands up on its own and doesnt tip over, very durable material, great quality, cute design, and very comfortable to wear. I'd recommend this product for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So many pockets for so much organization! Beautiful shimmery color, and great material overall. Not as “long” as I had pictured but still holds everything! Love the messenger bag strap!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Roemer

customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this diaper bag can't wait to use it. It's packed ready to go whenever babe decides to make his appearance
customer_reviews.author: Mamaof2

customer_reviews.title: It has a changing pad which is a great idea with lots of space
customer_reviews.text: This bag is everything I wanted. It has a changing pad which is a great idea with lots of space. I'm very glad I bought this bag
customer_reviews.author: dolly

customer_reviews.title: Baby Bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for gift but I like its look weight and size I like all its features and know it will be very useful
customer_reviews.author: MISS P

customer_reviews.title: Best baby bag ever
customer_reviews.text: This bag had everything I wanted. I love the utility of it and all the different pockets that cater to everything you would put into your diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: victor cortez

customer_reviews.title: Overall  awesome Diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Pros: perfect amount of pockets, wipe clean material, zip closures, outside wipe access (I love this way more than expected) Cons: bag is heavy because of wipe clean material, insulated bottle pocket is too tight too fit my bottle 🙁
customer_reviews.author: Jessica F.

customer_reviews.title: Very functional,  not the most durable
customer_reviews.text: Great diaper bag, especially for the price. Rating 3 stars only because after uaing it for a month the inside pockets started coming unstitched. Otherwise love it, very spacious, convieinet stroller straps, and love the crossbody strap. I also love that it easily wipes clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase. Durable and light weight. Holds a lot of items!
customer_reviews.author: logan demeny

customer_reviews.title: The best diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: After three babies and tried so many diapers bags. This is the best one my husband and I love it. It is not too big it is just the perfect size. Easy to clean and easy to put it in the stroller. We definitely recommend it !!!!
customer_reviews.author: bruno j burga

customer_reviews.title: Don’t need a purse can hold your wallet and other belongings.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this diaper bag nice and roomie. Fabric is easily to be cleaned plus very stylish. Compartments are great use for bottles wipes and for your personal belongings. Nice straps for easy carrying.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great size and versatility. This model is the same design as one I bought from skip hop previously but this one is half the price. Comes with everything you need.
customer_reviews.author: Wins

customer_reviews.title: ... bulking for my likely but if you want a sturdy bad with lots of room this is the bag ...
customer_reviews.text: Too heavy and bulking for my likely but if you want a sturdy bad with lots of room this is the bag you want. I carried it for one day and my back was killing me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy and would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping inside would be a bit bigger but it is plenty big enough and has ample pocket space. Love the stroller clips and it's good for me and Hubby to use
customer_reviews.author: R.Bundy

customer_reviews.title: Has pocket for wipes
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my granddaughter she loved it
customer_reviews.author: Meme

customer_reviews.title: The perfect diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: For my daughter in law for are new grandson it’s the perfect diaper bag lots of pockets lots of room just what you want in a diaper bag
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Loove!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this diaper bag! Many pockets and tons of room!
customer_reviews.author: MammaBear12

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag-not cheap looking and love the print!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift and will give it at a shower next week. I personally like it! It’s big but not too big, has roomy pockets outside and many inside. Material feels substantial, not thin or cheap. Just hope the new mom to be likes it!
customer_reviews.author: CSH

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Such great quality for the price. I was shocked at how nice it is. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Tons of room, especially helpful if you have more than one child still in diapers. The price is awesome and design is unique. Packaged well and will be an awesome diaper bag
customer_reviews.author: Momma to be

customer_reviews.title: Nice DiaperBag
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice diaper bag. A lot of compartments for all your babies stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Trowgirl

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and practical
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this bag so far. I have a 2 year old toddler and 2 month old baby, and can fit everything I need without having to lug around a bulky bag, and can find things very easily. The style and look is quite lovely too with soft fabric and shiny patterns.
customer_reviews.author: CarmenKlein

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as I thought it was gonna be inside.
customer_reviews.author: H Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the purchase I made. With this being my third child I kind of know now what to expect with diaper bags. This one takes the cake and the price is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Chase

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and quality diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and quality diaper bag, however, I had to return it because it wasn’t quite wide enough to fit the bottle cooler I had to put in it for when my son was at the babysitter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is for my 4th and last child and it’s been the best diaper bag I’ve ever used! Plenty of space for everything and lots of pockets!
customer_reviews.author: Kristian Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I havent used it for long yet, but this diaper bag is very cute and convenient. Awesome for the price as we all know diaper bags can be expensive :)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Healy

customer_reviews.title: Great baby gift.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter-in-law that she actually picked out. She was extremely pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Beth J

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: There is plenty of space for everything you need and more. The changing pad is a lifesaver too. The only thing is that the pocket for wipes is a little small. I can only fit partially used packs of wipes in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a gift for my neighbor, ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my neighbor, but haven't given it to her yet. I will give to her soon
customer_reviews.author: Gloria H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an everyday diaper bag.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quility and size. Material seems like it will be easy to clean. It has a ton of pockets for storage and the outter wipes pocket is really convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Jesi A.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is super cute, and seems very durable! Can’t wait to use it!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! The pockets make it easy to pack everything you need! I just wish there were 2 bottle pockets because I have twins so that means double everything! The changing pad is also a nice and it’s easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Alfreda M

customer_reviews.title: Best diaper bag ever!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with this diaper bag!! So many pouches and pockets everywhere, it’s so efficient. Plus it’s excellent quality. My husband loves it too! Money well spent for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little Large
customer_reviews.text: The bag looked large and bulky than in images. Returned it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Sandeep

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Arrived exactly as pictured. Looks great and is very well made. The zipper is fairly heavy duty compared to any other diaper bad I've had, which is just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Bo Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I intend on returning this. It has stunk up my entire house. I put it outside thinking that it would air out but it did not. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Ridgway

customer_reviews.title: lite weight and convenient. i was worried it would ...
customer_reviews.text: lite weight and convenient. i was worried it would be to bulky with all the items inside of it but it's not. There a lot of room. my only con is that i wish there was more than just one insulated bottle holder.

product_meta.title: Diaper Bag for Baby By Zohzo - Diaper Tote Bag With Changing Pad, Insulated Pockets, Wipes Pocket, Waterproof Material, Stroller Straps, and Shoulder Strap
feature_bullets: INCLUDES MATCHING STROLLER STRAPS - Go hands-free with the universal, removable stroller straps. Engineered precisely for exact weight distribution - this won't topple your stroller and keep all your essentials within arms reach.

TONS OF POCKETS TO STAY ORGANIZED - Engineered carefully to maximize functionality with a precise 11 pockets – per our real-parents market research group. Includes cushioned changing pad and custom pockets for one-hand grab for diapers and wipes. The thermal-insulated bottle pocket helps keep baby's milk safe and protected from unsafe temperature change. A protective pacifier pocket and multiple zippered pockets keeps your wallet, phone, and keys safely stored and easy-to-find.

STAY STYLISH AND COOL WITH EVERYTHING YOU NEED ON THE GO - 1 deluxe diaper tote, 1 soft, padded changing pad with matching boho designer pattern, 1 cushioned shoulder strap, adjustable & detachable, 2 stroller straps, adjustable & detachable
MATCHING CHANGING PAD INCLUDED - Our oversized changing pad in matching print makes changing your baby's diaper easy anywhere!
BACKED BY THE ZOHZO 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - If you are not happy with your purchase for any reason, we'll make it right!
